citations.desc: Primary enclosures used to transport live dogs and cats.
citations.narrative:
The registrant sometimes transports dogs in the vehicle without using a primary enclosure. The website for the business
shows two dogs in the vehicle without a primary enclosure and the registrant admits they sometimes transport dogs that
way. Not transporting a dog in a primary enclosure doesn't ensure the safety of that dog during transport. All dogs
transported from here on out must be transported in a primary enclosure. Correct starting on 7/29/25.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the registrant.
Note: No animals were on site during inspection.
End of report.
n

narrative:
3.15(a) 
   
Primary enclosures used to transport live dogs and cats. 
The registrant sometimes transports dogs in the vehicle without using a primary enclosure. The website for the business 
shows two dogs in the vehicle without a primary enclosure and the registrant admits they sometimes transport dogs that 
way. Not transporting a dog in a primary enclosure doesn't ensure the safety of that dog during transport. All dogs 
transported from here on out must be transported in a primary enclosure. Correct starting on 7/29/25. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the registrant. 
 
Note: No animals were on site during inspection. 
 
End of report. 
 
 n
